alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Benson; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:33AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Benson, Nelson, Griggs, eastern Ramsey, northwestern Barnes, western Walsh and eastern Eddy Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 632 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Garske to Spirit Lake Nation to Kensal. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hamar around 635 AM CDT. Tolna around 645 AM CDT. Derrick around 655 AM CDT. Edmore and Sutton around 700 AM CDT. Revere and Mapes around 705 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for southeastern and northeastern North Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Benson; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Western Walsh County
